title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, model management, streaming chat.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI for Ollama with completions, history, and interactive chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack for Ollama + Open WebUI + GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for using Ollama with Python, JS, Go, RAG, function-calling, etc.

title: ollama-gpt
summary: Research repo fine-tuning GPT-J on Ollama logs for conversational assistants.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies and model switching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed client and async streaming for Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management; supports .NET 6+.
